Articles.Content:
Everytime i verifye my beloved KSP stock installation Steam finds 2 tiny files to redownload. Everytime, since years. What is this?
Has anyone else observed the same? Is this normal?
(Win10 64bit Home Edition on a i7 with 250GB SSD, europa)
Because the game is modifying those files when you launch the game. I guess one is settings.cfg.
